author: Dee Wright
text:
The City of Portsmouth is currently doing a study on Mounted Police Patrol.  Does your locality have a mounted patrol unit? If so, whats the cost and benefit associated with having such. If you've previously had a mounted patrol unit, how was it disbanded?
Demetrice (Dee) L. Wright
Senior Management Analyst
City of Portsmouth ~ Office of the City Manager
801 Crawford Street
Portsmouth, Virginia 23704
(757) 393-8641 ext. 6134
wrightd@portsmouthva.gov
title: Mounted Police Patrol
